text:
@SecPompeo @IsraeliPM @netanyahu @gantzbe Sad to say : you r loser in Covid19. As people pay for your mismanagement.

Glad to say: you are loser on forcing  iran to come to its knees.

"Heshmat Alavi " will appear to praise you soon...
I mean; MEK rep.
